description: Describes the alias for a theme.

parameters.name: AwsAccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that contains the theme alias that you're describing.

parameters.name: AliasName
parameters.description: The name of the theme alias that you want to describe.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the theme alias.

nested_items.name: AliasName
nested_items.description: The display name of the theme alias.

nested_items.name: ThemeVersionNumber
nested_items.description: The version number of the theme alias.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The HTTP status of the request.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services request ID for this operation.
